A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Suckered Again!  
Story line is completely and 100% irrelevant to the stakeholders.  There are so many holes\, unnecessary plot lines that go no where and characters who bring nothing to move the plot forward.  So angry that they don't care to get it right.  SO MUCH WASTED!!!
